sourcesContent:
export const mockBookings = [
  {
    id: '1',
    hotelName: 'Grand Luxury Hotel',
    roomType: 'Deluxe Suite',
    checkIn: '2024-03-15',
    checkOut: '2024-03-18',
    guests: 2,
    totalPrice: 450,
    status: 'Confirmed',
    bookingDate: '2024-02-20',
    contactName: 'John Doe',
    contactEmail: 'john.doe@email.com',
    contactPhone: '+1234567890',
    specialRequests: 'Early check-in requested',
    paymentMethod: 'Credit Card',
    roomNumber: '301',
  },
  {
    id: '2',
    hotelName: 'Seaside Resort & Spa',
    roomType: 'Ocean View Room',
    checkIn: '2024-04-01',
    checkOut: '2024-04-05',
    guests: 3,
    totalPrice: 800,
    status: 'Confirmed',
    bookingDate: '2024-02-25',
    contactName: 'John Doe',
    contactEmail: 'john.doe@email.com',
    contactPhone: '+1234567890',
    specialRequests: 'Extra bed needed',
    paymentMethod: 'PayPal',
    roomNumber: '502',
  },
  {
    id: '3',
    hotelName: 'City Center Hotel',
    roomType: 'Executive Room',
    checkIn: '2024-03-10',
    checkOut: '2024-03-12',
    guests: 1,
    totalPrice: 300,
    status: 'Completed',
    bookingDate: '2024-02-15',
    contactName: 'John Doe',
    contactEmail: 'john.doe@email.com',
    contactPhone: '+1234567890',
    specialRequests: 'Late check-out requested',
    paymentMethod: 'Credit Card',
    roomNumber: '201',
  },
  {
    id: '4',
    hotelName: 'Mountain View Lodge',
    roomType: 'Family Suite',
    checkIn: '2024-05-20',
    checkOut: '2024-05-25',
    guests: 4,
    totalPrice: 1200,
    status: 'Pending',
    bookingDate: '2024-03-01',
    contactName: 'John Doe',
    contactEmail: 'john.doe@email.com',
    contactPhone: '+1234567890',
    specialRequests: 'Crib needed for infant',
    paymentMethod: 'Credit Card',
    roomNumber: 'Pending',
  },
  {
    id: '5',
    hotelName: 'Business Hotel',
    roomType: 'Standard Room',
    checkIn: '2024-03-05',
    checkOut: '2024-03-07',
    guests: 1,
    totalPrice: 200,
    status: 'Cancelled',
    bookingDate: '2024-02-10',
    contactName: 'John Doe',
    contactEmail: 'john.doe@email.com',
    contactPhone: '+1234567890',
    specialRequests: 'None',
    paymentMethod: 'Credit Card',
    roomNumber: 'N/A',
  }
];
